Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Allows cooperative agreements by licensees to sell wine or liquor at retail for consumption off the premises
Summary: Allows certain licensees to form cooperative agreements to make joint purchases of alcoholic beverages provided that such agreement and activity conform to certain standards.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to allowing cooperative agreements by licensees to sell wine or liquor at retail for consumption off the premises
